app.tip-notification: Tip: you can navigate pages with arrow keys!

home.title: Welcome to my Portfolio
home.intro:
Hi, I'm a 1st-year Computer Science student in the "BUT Informatique" program in Clermont-Ferrand (France).
I love coding, tinkering with my OS, and creating efficient solutions to problems.
Besides tech I try to learn piano and sometimes draw.
Welcome to my portfolio!

1.title: BUT Informatique
1.content: 1st-year student exploring the world of computer science and software development.

2.title: High School Diploma
2.content: Graduated with a specialization in computers (SIN).

3.title: Internship - Tech Support and Servers
3.content: Learned about collaboration in a professional environment.

4.title: Self-Taught Programming
4.content: Began exploring programming with small projects, setting the foundation for future learning.

command-line.title: Command Line
command-line.description:
Here, you can navigate through the content of all the pages using Unix commands.
Use ls to list available files, then cat [filename] to read a file.
You can also see all the available commands with help.
